name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Ascendency_of_the_Dominator_B
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Ascendency of the Dominator B
display_fullname: Boosts.Superior Attuned Ascendency of the Dominator B
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the hold duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the immobilization duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the sleep duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}%, the fear duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}% and the confuse duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Dominators and may be slotted into most control powers.
power_display_names: Superior Ascendency of the Dominator: Control Duration/Recharge
